## Ordinary differential Equation (ODE)

#| output:true

$$\frac{du}{dt} = pu = f(u,p,t)$$

```{julia}

using DifferentialEquations, Plots; plotly()


f(u,p,t) = p * u 

interest_p = 1.0,
balance_begin = 1.0
t_begin = 0.0
t_end = 1.0
tspan = (t_begin,t_end)

prob = ODEProblem(f,balance_begin,tspan,interest_p)
sol = solve(prob)

plot(sol,
    legend = false,
    linewidth = 2,
    title = "Compound Interest",
    xaxis = "Time in Years",
    yaxis = "Balance in Dollars",
    formatter = :plain,
    widen = true
)

```
